message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_FV_PATTERNID_EMPTY
message.locale: A Product Delivery Pattern must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_FV_CASENOMINEEID_EMPTY
message.locale: A Case Nominee must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_XFV_FROMDATE_TODATE
message.locale: There is another active delivery pattern on the date "%1d". Please select start date of new delivery pattern to be after "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_XRV_FROM_DATE_DELIVERY_PATTERN
message.locale: The date you have entered is not a valid product re-occurrence date. The next valid date, after the date that you entered, is "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_XRV_DELIVERYPATTERN_OBJECTIVE_ASSIGNMENT
message.locale: Proposed Delivery Pattern cannot be applied from "%1d" as there is a component assigned to this Case Nominee on "%2d", which would not be a valid payment date.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_FV_UNKNOWN_COVERPERIODTYPE
message.locale: The new delivery pattern cannot be applied as the cover period type "%1s" is not recognised.
The new delivery pattern cannot be applied as the cover period type "%1s" is not recognized.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_FV_PATTERN_EXISTS
message.locale: The delivery pattern already exists on this date.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_XRV_CASE_ALREADY_PAID
message.locale: You cannot alter the Nominee's delivery pattern as the case has already been paid to "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_XRV_EARLIEST_PATTERN_EXISTS
message.locale: The earliest date that this nominee's delivery pattern can be modified to is "%1d"

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_XRV_INVALID_DATE_DELIVERY_PATTERN
message.locale: The from date you have entered is not a valid product re-occurrence date.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_XRV_FROMDATE_BEFORE_CASESTART
message.locale: Effective from date of delivery pattern cannot be before case start date - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_XRV_CHANGE_IN_DELIVERY_PATTERN
message.locale: Delivery Patten cannot be changed as the case status is Delayed Processing.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_XRV_NOMINEE_DELIVERY_PATTERN_EXISTS
message.locale: This delivery pattern is already a current delivery pattern for the nominee.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_XFV_NO_DEL_PATTERN_EXISTS_FOR_DATE_SEL
message.locale: The start date of the component assignment must not be earlier than the start date of the nominee delivery pattern selected. The nominee delivery pattern starts on "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_XRV_NO_ADDRESS_FOR_CHEQUE
message.locale: The Nominee must have a current address to use a delivery pattern of type "%1s".
